TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CngKeyBlobFormat extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat>
Public NotInheritable Class CngKeyBlobFormat Implements IEquatable(Of CngKeyBlobFormat)
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CngKeyBlobFormat extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyBlobFormat>

summary.span: 指定用于 Microsoft 下一代加密技术 (CNG) 对象的密钥 BLOB 格式。

span.span: Specifies a key BLOB format for use with Microsoft Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个实用工具类。The class is a utility class. 它由静态属性、比较方法和用于指定密钥 BLOB 格式名称的私有、内部维护的字符串组成。It consists of static properties, comparison methods, and a private, internally maintained string that specifies the key BLOB format name. 静态属性返回 对象。The static properties return objects. 每个对象的内部字符串名称初始化为与静态属性的名称相对应的密钥 BLOB 格式名称。Each object's internal string name is initialized to the key BLOB format name that corresponds to the name of the static property. 你还可以使用此类为静态属性未涵盖的密钥 BLOB 格式创建对象。You can also use this class to create objects for key BLOB formats that are not covered by the static properties. 某些 CNG 类 (如 ) 通过参数接受对象 `format` 。Several CNG classes (such as ) accept objects through a `format` parameter. 当类接收对象时 ，它通过调用对象的属性来检索密钥 BLOB 格式的嵌入名称 。When the class receives the object, it retrieves the embedded name of the key BLOB format by calling the object's property. 因此，用作 众所周知的密钥 BLOB 格式的枚举。Therefore, serves as an enumeration of well-known key BLOB formats. 使用强类型化值（而不是字符串），可以识别众所周知的密钥 BLOB 格式。It lets you identify a well-known key BLOB format by using a strongly typed value instead of a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string format) cil managed

param.name: format
param.span: 要初始化的密钥 BLOB 格式。

span.span: The key BLOB format to initialize.

summary.span: 使用指定的格式初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的主要目的是提供一种方法，用于为 不是由类的静态属性表示的格式类型创建对象 。The primary purpose of this constructor is to provide a method for creating objects for format types that are not represented by the static properties of the class. 此容量允许将来的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 版本、service pack 和第三方开发人员添加新的密钥 blob 格式，这种格式的访问方式与当前可用的密钥 blob 格式相同。This capacity allows future [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] releases, service packs, and third-party developers to add new key BLOB formats, which can be accessed just like the key BLOB formats that are currently available.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter length is 0 (zero).

summary.span: 获取 对象，此对象指定包含显式曲线参数的椭圆曲线加密 (ECC) 密钥的私钥 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a private key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key which contains explicit curve parameters.

value.span: 描述私钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object describing a private key BLOB.

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a public key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key which contains explicit curve parameters.

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，它指定椭圆曲线加密法 (ECC) 密钥的私钥 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a private key BLOB for an elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) key.

value.span: 一个指定 ECC 私钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies an ECC private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ECC 私钥 BLOB 格式同时包含 ECC 密钥的公共部分和专用部分。The ECC private key BLOB format contains both the public and private portions of an ECC key.

span.span: An object that specifies an ECC public key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ECC 公钥 BLOB 格式只包含 ECC 密钥的公共部分。The ECC public key BLOB format contains only the public portion of an ECC key.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GenericPrivateBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 获取一个指定泛型私钥 BLOB 的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a generic private key BLOB.

value.span: 一个指定泛型私钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies a generic private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型私钥 BLOB 可以包含任何类型的私钥，不一定包含对应的公钥。A generic private key BLOB can contain a private key of any type and does not necessarily contain the corresponding public key. 只能通过检查 BLOB 来确定 BLOB 包含的键的类型。The type of key that the BLOB contains can be determined only by examining the BLOB.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property GenericPublicBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

value.span: 一个指定泛型公钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies a generic public key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型公钥 BLOB 可以包含任何类型的公钥。A generic public key BLOB can contain a public key of any type. BLOB 包含的公钥类型只能通过检查 BLOB 来确定。The type of public key that the BLOB contains can be determined only by examining the BLOB.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property OpaqueTransportBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 获取一个指定不透明传输密钥 BLOB 的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies an opaque transport key BLOB.

value.span: 一个指定不透明传输密钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies an opaque transport key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不透明传输密钥 BLOB 的格式由每个密钥存储提供程序确定，并与相关联。The format of an opaque transport key BLOB is determined by, and associated with, each key storage provider. 以不透明传输格式导入和导出密钥需要对这两种操作使用相同的密钥存储提供程序。Importing and exporting a key in opaque transport format requires using the same key storage provider for both operations.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pkcs8PrivateBlob As CngKeyBlobFormat

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，它指定私钥信息语法标准 (PKCS #8) 密钥 BLOB。

span.span: Gets a object that specifies a Private Key Information Syntax Standard (PKCS #8) key BLOB.

value.span: 一个指定 PKCS #8 私钥 BLOB 的对象。

span.span: An object that specifies a PKCS #8 private key BLOB.

remarks.format: ## Remarks PKCS #8 私钥 BLOB 同时包含 PKCS #8 格式的私钥和公钥。A PKCS #8 private key BLOB contains both private and public key material in PKCS #8 format.
